scripts.pack:stable: npm run stage-backend && npm run build && electron-builder --dir --config.directories.output=../release/stable/%npm_package_version%
scripts.pack:beta: npm run stage-backend && npm run build && electron-builder --dir --config.directories.output=../release/beta/%npm_package_version%
scripts.pack: node -e "const v=process.env.npm_package_version||''; const c=v.includes('-')?'beta':'stable'; const r=require('child_process').spawnSync('npm',['run',`pack:${c}`],{stdio:'inherit',shell:true}); process.exit(r.status??0);"
scripts.dist:stable: npm run stage-backend && npm run build && electron-builder --config.directories.output=../release/stable/%npm_package_version% --publish never
scripts.dist:beta: npm run stage-backend && npm run build && electron-builder --config.directories.output=../release/beta/%npm_package_version% --publish never
scripts.dist: node -e "const v=process.env.npm_package_version||''; const c=v.includes('-')?'beta':'stable'; const r=require('child_process').spawnSync('npm',['run',`dist:${c}`],{stdio:'inherit',shell:true}); process.exit(r.status??0);"
